effects:
Gain 2 uses of the following skills for one turn:
	Desperation (222250)
	Giant Overkill (505410)
	Giant Slayer (222230)
	Heaven's Chalice (505420)
	Heaven's Gate (222240)
	Radiant Blast (222260)
	Rampart (222270)
	Shining Storm (505430) [not usable with 2H weapon]
Reduce damage taken by 50% to caster for one turn

Gain access to following skills for one turn:
	Giant Overkill (505410)
	Heaven's Chalice (505420)
	Shining Storm (505430)
name: Default Guard

desc_short: Reduce damage taken for one turn for self and enable bravery, giant overkill, heaven's chalice, and shining storm for one turn
1回合內減少對自身的傷害+1回合內可以使用「勇氣」「超強殺傷」「天堂聖杯」「閃耀風暴」
1턴 동안 사용자가 받는 피해량 감소+1턴 동안 '브레이브', '자이언트 오버킬', '천국의 성배', '빛의 폭풍' 사용 가능
Réduit les dégâts subis par le lanceur pendant un tour, et active Bravoure, Extermination totale, Calice céleste et Tempête brillante pour un tour
Verringert eine Runde lang selbst erhaltenen Schaden und ermöglicht eine Runde lang Brave, Maßloser Schaden, Himmelskelch und Glimmersturm.
Reduce el daño que recibe el usuario durante un turno y aprende Bravura, Exterminación total, Cáliz celestial y Tormenta brillante durante 1 turno
